title: Roast loin of lamb, peas, lettuce and bacon
description: Roast lamb accompanied by peas, mint and lettuce, this recipe captures Spring's sweetness and freshness.This meal provides 451 kcal, 37g protein, 5.5g carbohydrate (of which 2.5g sugars), 31g fat (of which 14.5g saturates), 2.3g fibre and 1.9g salt per portion.
ingredients: 2 loins of lamb, boned, weighing 600g/1lb 4oz in total
salt and freshly ground black pepper
